name: Nirvana In Utero Tie-Dye

description: Metallica Kill 'Em All hoodie featuring the classic Blood on the Dance Floor artwork. Heavy cotton blend, perfect for mosh pits and cold nights.

description: Rare Slipknot Goat windbreaker jacket. Features the iconic goat logo with detailed embroidery. Lightweight and perfect for layering.

description: HIM Heartagram hoodie with the signature love metal logo. Deep black with crimson heartagram print. A must-have for Ville Valo fans.

name: Opeth
description: Opeth hoodie featuring the progressive metal legends' classic logo. Warm and comfortable with a vintage fade effect.

name: Opeth Blackwater Park
description: Opeth Blackwater Park hoodie celebrating their landmark 2001 album. Dark artwork with the iconic tree design.

name: Radiohead
description: Radiohead hoodie with subtle album-inspired artwork. Perfect for fans of alternative rock's most experimental band.

name: Korn
description: Korn zip-up hoodie with the nu-metal pioneers' signature logo. Full zip with oversized graphics front and back.

name: Slipknot
description: Slipknot hoodie featuring the nine-pointed star logo. Heavy-duty construction for everyday wear.

name: Limp Bizkit
description: Limp Bizkit hoodie from the Significant Other era. Classic red and black design with the iconic logo.

name: Carcass / Death Metal
description: Carcass death metal zip-up hoodie. Olive green with graphic death metal artwork. A true collector's piece for extreme metal fans.

description: Metallica Ride the Lightning allover print hoodie. Stunning full-coverage electric chair artwork. Premium quality print that won't fade.

name: Rolling Stones
description: Rolling Stones classic tongue logo sweatshirt. Vintage wash effect with the most recognizable logo in rock history.

name: Nirvana In Utero
description: Nirvana In Utero sweatshirt with the anatomical angel artwork. Soft fleece interior, pre-shrunk cotton blend.

description: Metallica World Magnetic Tour hoodie. Official tour merchandise with dates on the back.

description: AC/DC Rock or Bust hoodie featuring Angus Young's iconic silhouette. Classic rock meets modern comfort.

description: Parkway Drive hoodie from the Australian metalcore legends. Bold graphic design with the band's signature style.

name: Dr. Martens Pascal
description: Dr. Martens Pascal 6-eye boots in classic black. Softer Virginia leather with the iconic AirWair sole. Broken in and ready to wear.

description: Dr. Martens 1461 Quad platform shoes. Elevated sole adds height while maintaining the classic 3-eye silhouette.

description: Dr. Martens 1460 8-eye boots. Well-loved vintage pair with beautiful patina and character.

description: My Chemical Romance Black Parade hoodie. The Welcome to the Black Parade album artwork on premium cotton.

name: Dark Divine
description: Dark Divine hoodie with atmospheric gothic artwork. Deep blacks with subtle detailing.

description: The Offspring Smash hoodie featuring artwork from their breakthrough album. '90s punk rock nostalgia at its finest.

name: Marilyn Manson
description: Marilyn Manson hoodie featuring the shock rocker's provocative artwork. A statement piece for any collection.
